name: Drive Fast Car on Highway
description:
Drive Fast Car on Highway is the best mobile racing game you have been looking for. You drive your car in cockpit view through the endless traffic and realistic environment. Drive fast as you can in heavy traffic on extreme offroad and city infinite highway sports car game. Tilt your device to drag your car wherever you want, overtake traffic, earn coins and buy new vehicles.
Features:
- Upgrade and customizable vehicles.
- Earn cash and rewards to unlock your cars
- Race the way your own choice you want
- Select your favourite control touch or tilt to steer
- Realistic highway car driving feeling
